channel.title: 614 Npc Spawn help? [Hero Source]
channel.description:
i have this in spawnlist [code]Notes: NPC ID, ABS X, ABS Y, ABS Z, MAXX, MAXY, MINX, MINY, ?RANDOMWALK [SPAWNLISTSTART] 0 3220 3223 0 3220 3223 3220 3223 false 1 3215 3220 0 3215 3220 3215 3220 false [SPAWNLISTEND][/code]
and this in deflist [code] Default Information: NPC ID, ATTACKABLE? Combat Information: COMBAT LV, MAX HP, AGRESSIVE?, MAX MELEE HIT, MAX RANGE HIT, MAX MAGIC HIT Emote Information: WALK EMOTE, ATTACK EMOTE, DEFEND EMOTE, DEATH EMOTE GFX Information: MAGIC PROJECTILE GFX, MAGIC PROJECTILE SPLASH GFX, RANGE PROJECTILE GFX, RANGE PROJECTILE SPLASH GFX Extensive Emote Information: MELEE EMOTE, MAGIC EMOTE, RANGE EMOTE Extensive Combat Information: MELEE DELAY, MAGIC DELAY, RANGE DELAY, DEFEND MELEE?, DEFEND RANGE?, DEFEND MAGIC?, USESMELEE?, USESMAGIC?, USESRANGE?, RESPOND DELAY [DEFLISTSTART] 0 false 1 true 2 70 false 10 0 0 0 0 425 9055 0 0 0 0 422 0 0 3 0 0 false false false true false false 50 [DEFLISTEND] [/code] For some reason they won't spawn? any help?

item.title: 614 Npc Spawn help? [Hero Source]
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
